name: The Tesla Protocol
description:
Arcade-style game where you fight your way through a hostile alien star ship, armed with 2 Arc Nodes that connect to zap anything between them when attached to the walls. Survive as long as you can!

Our high score is 732. 
If you can beat that comment your score for bragging rights!

Credits:

  • Thomas Bonatti
  • Jared Hoffman
  • Whirligig231
